line.text:
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:05AM
Following an earlier incident at 96 St, [2] and [3] train service has resumed with residual delays.

Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:09AM
There is no [6D] express train service in the Bronx, due to NYCT Cold Weather Plan.
Allow additional travel time.
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:05AM
Following an earlier incident at 96 St, [2] and [3] train service has resumed with residual delays.

text.P: Due to switch problems at Ozone Park-Lefferts Blvd,Â [A] trains are running with delays in both directions.Â
Allow additional travel time.
Due to signal problems at Jamaica-179 St,Â southbound [F] trains are running with delays.
Allow additional travel time.

a.b: [D] Coney Island-bound trains skip 71 St, 79 St, 18 Av and 20 Av

text.div:
Days, 9:45 AM to 3 PM, Thu and Fri, Mar 5 - 6
For service to these stations, take the [D] to Bay Pkwy
and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].
For service from these stations, take the [D] to 62 St-New Utrecht Av
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

text.P: Due to inclement weather, expect delays on all Brooklyn local and express bus service in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
B83Â and Q56 buses are detoured due to construction at BroadwayÂ and Van Sinderen Av.
Detour is as follows:
Westbound: Via Jamaica Av, right on Fulton St, last stop is Fulton St far side of Van Sinderen Av.
Eastbound: Via Fulton St, right on Eastern Pkwy, right on Broadway, right on Van Sinderen into Stand then regular.
Allow additional travel time.
B38 and B38 Ltd are detoured, due to construction at Lafayette Av between Stuyvesant AvÂ and Malcolm X Blvd.
Detour is as follows:
Eastbound: Via Lafayette Av, right on Stuyvesant Av, left on Greene Av, left on Malcolm X Blvd, right on Lafayette Av and regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made along detour route.
Allow additional travel time.
text.a: B24 and B46/B46 LTD buses detoured from the Entrance on Broadway at Washington Plz Terminal
text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, buses operate as follows:
Via Broadway
Right on Roebling St into Washington Plaza.

a.b:
B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway
Junction due to construction - No stops missed

text.div:
Until further notice
Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av
Into Fulton St
Right on Eastern Pkwy
Left on Broadway then regular route
Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

text.P: Due to inclement weather, expect delays on all Brooklyn local and express bus service in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
Due to inclement weather, expect delays on all Brooklyn local and express bus service in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
Due to inclement weather expect delays on all Bronx local and express bus service in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
Bx9, Bx12, Bx17 and Bx22 northbound buses are running with delays, due to heavy traffic on Fordham Rd.
Allow additional travel time.
BX10, BX20, BXM1 and BXM2 buses are detoured, due to a snow condition at Henry Hudson Pkwy and 235 St.
Detour is as follows:
BX10, BX20, BXM1 andÂ BXM2 Southbound: Via Henry Hudson Pkwy service road, right on 237 St, left on Independence Av, right on Henry Hudson Pkwy service road and regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made along detour route.
Allow additional travel time.

a.b: Bx10 and Bx20 - Southbound buses rerouted from Henry Hudson Pkwy at 235 St

text.div:
Until further notice
Due to road conditions, buses will make corresponding stops along the detoured route.
Show Reroute Details
Via 49 St
Right on 10 Av
Left on 51 St
Left on 11 Av
Right on 49 St then regular route
Reminder: Bx20 buses do not operate overnight or weekends.

text.P: Due to inclement weather expect delays on all Bronx local and express bus service in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
BX10, BX20, BXM1 and BXM2 buses are detoured, due to a snow condition at Henry Hudson Pkwy and 235 St.
Detour is as follows:
BX10, BX20, BXM1 andÂ BXM2 Southbound: Via Henry Hudson Pkwy service road, right on 237 St, left on Independence Av, right on Henry Hudson Pkwy service road and regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made along detour route.
Allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:15AM
M1, M2, M3Â and M4 buses are running with delays due to heavy traffic on 5 Av from 139 St to 125 StÂ and from 110 St to 96 St.
Allow additional travelÂ time. Â
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:14AM
M98, M101, M102 and M103 buses are running with delays in both directions, due to heavy traffic on Lexington Av between 116 St to 86 St.
Allow additional travel time.
Service Change
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:10AM
M9 and M103 buses are detoured, due to Con Ed work at Park Row.
Detour is as follows:
M9 Southbound: Via Park Row, right on Worth St, left on Lafayette St and regular route.
M103 Southbound: Via Bowery St, right on Worth St, left on Lafayette St and regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made.
Allow additional travel time.
Planned Detour
M21 - Eastbound stop on Houston St between Chrystie St and Forsyth St temporarily relocated
Until further notice
Due to construction, please follow directional signage to nearby temporary stop.

text.P: Due to inclement weather expect delays on all Queens local and express bus service.
All limited bus service will be making local stops except for the following routes: Q6, Q10, Q44, Q52, Q53, Q113 and Q114.
Allow additional travel time.
B83Â and Q56 buses are detoured due to construction at BroadwayÂ and Van Sinderen Av.
Detour is as follows:
Westbound: Via Jamaica Av, right on Fulton St, last stop is Fulton St far side of Van Sinderen Av.
Eastbound: Via Fulton St, right on Eastern Pkwy, right on Broadway, right on Van Sinderen into Stand then regular.
Allow additional travel time.

a.b: Q47 and Q49 - Southbound/Westbound buses rerouted from 75 St between 35 Av and 37 Av

text.div:
Until further notice
Due to road work, buses operate as follows, making corresponding stops along the detoured routes.
Show Reroute Details
Q47 Southbound
Via 73 St
Right on 35 Av
Left on 65 St
Left on Broadway then regular route
Q49 Westbound
Via 35 Av
Left on 65 St
Left on Broadway then regular route

a.b: Q7 and Q41- Eastbound/Northbound stop on Liberty Av at 95 St temporarily closed

text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, please use the temporary stop on Cross Bay Blvd at Liberty Av of the Q11 stop.

a.b: Q27 stops on 216 St between 48 Av and 56 Av temporarily closed

text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, please use temporary stops on Springfield Blvd in both directions.
Show Reroute Details
Northbound
Via 56 Av
Right on Springfield Blvd
Left on 48 Av then regular route
Southbound
Via 48 Av
Right on Springfield Av
Left on 56 Av then regular route

a.b:
B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway
Junction due to construction - No stops missed

text.div:
Until further notice
Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av
Into Fulton St
Right on Eastern Pkwy
Left on Broadway then regular route
Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

text.P: Due to inclement weather expect delays on all Queens local and express bus service.
All limited bus service will be making local stops except for the following routes: Q6, Q10, Q44, Q52, Q53, Q113 and Q114.
Allow additional travel time.
S66 buses are detoured, due to icy conditions on Highland Av between Arlo RdÂ and Victory Blvd.
Detour is as follows:
S66 Port Richmond Bound: Via Victory Blvd, stay straight on Victory Blvd and regular route to Port Richmond.
S66 St George Ferry Bound: Via Victory Blvd, stay on Victory Blvd and regular route to St George Ferry.
Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Hudson
line.text:
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 9:42AM
Hudson Line service continues to experience residual delays up to 20 minutes due to earlier weather related power problems in the Park Avenue Tunnel. Please listen for announcements at your station.

line.name: New Haven
line.text:
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 10:03AM
New Haven Line service continues to experience residual delays up to 40 minutes due to earlier weather related power problems in the Vicinity of Pelham and the Park Avenue Tunnel. Please listen for announcements at your station.

line.name: New Canaan
line.text:
Delays
Posted: 03/05/2015 9:28AM
New Canaan Branch 9:35 AM train from New Canaan to Stamford has been canceled. The Next southbound train from New Canaan to Stamford will depart New Canaan at 10:28 AM. Please listen for announcements at your station.
